sqlMap.select: SELECT A.POPUP_ID, A.POPUP_SJ_NM POPUP_TITLE_NM, A.FILE_URL, A.POPUP_VRTICL_LC, A.POPUP_WIDTH_LC, A.POPUP_VRTICL_SIZE, A.POPUP_WIDTH_SIZE, A.NTCE_BGNDE, A.NTCE_ENDDE, A.STOPVEW_SETUP_AT, A.NTCE_AT, DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM FROM COMTNPOPUPMANAGE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.NTCE_AT = 'Y' AND DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y%m%d%H%i') >= NTCE_BGNDE AND DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y%m%d%H%i') <= NTCE_ENDDE

SELECT A.POPUP_ID, A.POPUP_SJ_NM POPUP_TITLE_NM, A.FILE_URL, A.POPUP_VRTICL_LC, A.POPUP_WIDTH_LC, A.POPUP_VRTICL_SIZE, A.POPUP_WIDTH_SIZE, A.NTCE_BGNDE, A.NTCE_ENDDE, A.STOPVEW_SETUP_AT, A.NTCE_AT, DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM FROM COMTNPOPUPMANAGE A WHERE 1=1
AND POPUP_SJ_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
AND FILE_URL LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNPOPUPMANAGE WHERE 1=1
AND POPUP_SJ_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
AND FILE_URL LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNPOPUPMANAGE SET POPUP_SJ_NM=#popupTitleNm#, FILE_URL=#fileUrl#, POPUP_VRTICL_LC=#popupHlc#, POPUP_WIDTH_LC=#popupWlc#, POPUP_VRTICL_SIZE=#popupHSize#, POPUP_WIDTH_SIZE=#popupWSize#, NTCE_BGNDE=#ntceBgnde#, NTCE_ENDDE=#ntceEndde#, STOPVEW_SETUP_AT=#stopVewAt#, NTCE_AT=#ntceAt#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=sysdate(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# WHERE POPUP_ID=#popupId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.POPUP_ID, A.POPUP_SJ_NM, A.FILE_URL, A.POPUP_VRTICL_LC, A.POPUP_WIDTH_LC, A.POPUP_VRTICL_SIZE, A.POPUP_WIDTH_SIZE, A.NTCE_BGNDE, A.NTCE_ENDDE, A.STOPVEW_SETUP_AT, A.NTCE_AT, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNPOPUPMANAGE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.POPUP_ID=#popupId#
